description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5c3fq","text":"This is a protocol for performing RNAscope‱ in situ hybridization analysis on fixed-frozen mouse brain tissue using the RNAscope‱ Multiplex Fluorescent v2 kit (Advanced Cell Diagnostics; ACD). This RNAscope‱ protocol similar to the v2 protocol provided by ACD; places where it deviates from ACD's protocol have been indicated. This protocol also includes steps for sample preparation (including cryosectioning) and imaging of slides using a slide scanner.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":128,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":206,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}},"2":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ff5lt","text":"Collect sections spaced 20 μm apart between Bregma = +1.0–0.0 in RNase-free PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"890pn","text":"Immediately mount sections onto Superfrost‱ plus microscopy slides. Mount sections spaced 120 microns apart 4 per slide (Note that this is different from the ACD protocol, which recommends mounting only 1 section per slide). This amounts to a total of 8 sections between Bregma = +1.0–0.0 mounted onto 2 slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"22bik","text":"Allow slides to dry for 60 minutes at -20°C, then, immediately store at −80°C in a slide box placed inside of a Ziploc bag with drierite desiccant until the day of the RNAscope procedure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ejdk0","text":"Baking. Bake slides for 60 min at 60°C in the HybEZ‱ oven. Note that this is longer than the time recommended in the ACD v2 protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5h05i","text":"Post-fixation. Post-fix the slides by immersing them in 4% PFA in 1X PBS for 30 min at 4°C. Note that this post-fixation time is longer than the time recommended in the ACD v2 protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"997hb","text":"Serial dehydration. Slides are then rinsed once in ddH2O and then serially dehydrated using an ethanol series in the following  order: 50%, 70%, two times 100% ethanol (5 min each). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"sub","offset":54,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"41umb","text":"Hydrogen peroxide treatment. Take the dehydrated slides and add ~5–8 drops of RNAscope Hydrogen Peroxide to cover the sections on each slide. Treat sections with hydrogen peroxide (CAT no) for 10 minutes at RT. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"627as","text":"Rinse slides with ddH2O. Repeat with fresh ddH2O water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":21,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":46,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1eend","text":"Manual target retrieval. Perform manual target retrieval using Target Retrieval Reagents () as described in Appendix B of the ACD v2 protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bku96","text":"Prepare 700 mL of fresh RNAscope 1X Target Retrieval Reagents by adding 630 mL ddH2O to 1 bottle (70 mL) 10X Target Retrieval Reagents in a clean 1 L beaker. Mix well with stir bar on stir plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4bh4g","text":"Place the beaker containing RNAscope 1X Target Retrieval Reagents on the hot plate. Cover the beaker with foil, and turn the hot plate on high until 1X Target Retrieval Reagents reaches 98–102°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":186,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6miff","text":"With a pair of forceps, slowly submerge a Tissue-Tek Slide Rack containing the slides into RNAscope 1X Target Retrieval Reagents solution. Cover the beaker with foil and boil the slides for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":190,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2qid","text":"Wash slides 3–5 times by moving the Tissue-Tek Slide Rack up and down in the distilled water. Then Transfer the slides to 100% ethanol for 3 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"de40","text":"Slides are then air dried for 5 min and a hydrophobic barrier is drawn around sections using an ImmEdgeTM Pen (H-4000; Vector Laboratories, Inc.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":103,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"85jq7","text":"Incubate slides with Protease III (ACD) reagent for 30 min at 40°C in the HybEZ‱ oven.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"djera","text":"Wash slides 2x with ddH2O.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":23,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"959nt","text":"(Optional stopping point). You can store the slides in 5X SSC overnight at RT. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":62,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":75,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"41k62","text":"Hybridize AMP 1. Add RNAscope Multiplex FL v2 Amp1 to each slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8jnr","text":"Add probe mixture to slides. Refer to Appendix C. Reagent Volume Guidelines to determine the volume of probe mixture to add to each slide. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7nkn7","text":"Insert into HybEZ‱ oven for 2 hrs at 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":27,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":37,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hi4a","text":"Prepare probe mixture. C1 probes are 1X; C2 and C3 probes come as 50X solutions and therefore must be diluted 1:50 with the C1 probe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c7reh","text":"Hybridize AMP 2. Add RNAscope Multiplex FL v2 Amp2 to each slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dvdju","text":"Incubate in the HybEZ‱ oven for 30 min at 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":42,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pmnm","text":"Wash slides 2x for 2 min at RT with 1X Wash Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f069g","text":"Incubate in the HybEZ‱ oven for 30 min at 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":42,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36fof","text":"Wash slides 2x for 2 min at RT with 1X Wash Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f3vt4","text":"Hybridize AMP 3. Add RNAscope Multiplex FL v2 Amp3 to each slide Incubate in the HybEZ‱ oven for 15 min at 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16},{"style":"bold","offset":96,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":107,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7okk3","text":"Incubate in the HybEZ‱ oven for 15 min at 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":42,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7baie","text":"Wash slides 2x for 2 min at RT with 1X Wash Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ab5j","text":"Develop HRP-C1 signal. Add RNAscope Multiplex FL v2 HRP-C1 to slides.    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8n8ve","text":"Wash slides 2x for 2 min at RT with 1X Wash Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epa4b","text":" Incubate in the HybEZ‱ oven for 15 min at 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":43,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7a7ta","text":"Add 150-200 μL of fluorophore to label the C1 probe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ase04","text":"Incubate in the HybEZ‱ oven for 30 min at 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":42,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6lg5d","text":"Wash slides 2x for 2 min at RT with 1X Wash Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2074a","text":"Add RNAscope Multiplex FL v2 HRP blocker to slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bg6kh","text":"Incubate in the HybEZ‱ oven for 15 min at 40°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":42,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"11B53FB0828B11EE982A0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:","url":"https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9348902/#R49"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"83v78","text":"Wash slides 2x for 2 min at RT with 1X Wash Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":18,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6vv7q","text":"Develop HRP-C2 signal. Add RNAscope Multiplex FL v2 HRP-C2 to slides.    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
